description.zh-CN: Claymorphism 是 3D 黏土质感设计风格，适合创意设计、插画风格和儿童产品。通过多层内外阴影、柔和的色彩渐变和圆润的造型，创造如同真实黏土般的.粘土质感3D设计风格适合创意设计和插画。创造柔软雕塑美学和创意活泼。
description.en-US: Claymorphism is a 3D clay texture design style, suitable for creative design, illustration style, and children's creating immersive and engaging digital experiences through thoughtful design principles, modern aesthetics, and user-centered approach to interface development Creates tactile, approachable interfaces with 3D clay-like effects Ideal for children's applications, creative tools, and playful experiences This design approach offers a distinctive visual language suitable for modern applications. It combines aesthetic principles with functional design elements to create compelling user experiences. soft sculptural aesthetics and creative playfulness.
